golden_dataset.description: Curated edge cases for prompt improvement - focusing on cinema movements, cultural context, and technical innovations

movies.title: Citizen Kane
key_challenges: Cinema movement: Classical Hollywood (not indie)
Technical innovation: Deep focus cinematography (Gregg Toland)
Historical context: 1940s Hollywood studio system

movies.title: Bicycle Thieves
key_challenges: Cinema movement: Italian Neorealism
Historical context: Post-war Italy, economic devastation
Technical approach: Non-professional actors, location shooting

movies.title: Breathless
key_challenges: Cinema movement: French New Wave
Technical innovation: Jump cuts, handheld camera
Cultural context: 1960s French youth culture

movies.title: Another Round
key_challenges: Cinema movement: Dogme 95 influence
Technical approach: Naturalistic cinematography (Sturla Brandth Grøvlen)
Cultural context: Danish drinking culture, midlife crisis themes

movies.title: Parasite
key_challenges: Cultural context: Korean class dynamics, social inequality
Technical innovation: Production design as class commentary
Narrative structure: Genre-blending thriller/social drama

movies.title: Portrait of a Lady on Fire
key_challenges: Feminist cinema: Female gaze, women's agency
Technical approach: Natural light, painterly compositions
Historical context: 18th century France, women's limited options

movies.title: The Handmaiden
key_challenges: Korean New Wave: Park's baroque visual style
Cultural context: Colonial Korea (1930s), Japanese occupation
Narrative structure: Multiple perspectives, erotic thriller elements

movies.title: Burning
key_challenges: Slow cinema: Pacing, ambiguity, minimalism
Cultural context: Murakami adaptation, contemporary Korean society
Technical approach: Long takes, naturalistic acting

movies.title: Cold War
key_challenges: Historical context: 1950s-60s Poland, Stalinist era
Technical approach: Black & white cinematography, musical structure
Cultural context: Polish folk music vs. Western jazz

movies.title: Close-Up
key_challenges: Iranian New Wave: Documentary-fiction hybrid
Cultural context: Iranian cinema restrictions, art vs. reality
Narrative innovation: Re-enactment of real events

movies.title: In the Mood for Love
key_challenges: Visual style: Wong Kar-wai's color palette, Christopher Doyle cinematography
Cultural context: 1960s Hong Kong, immigrant communities
Technical approach: Handheld camera, music as narrative device

movies.title: A Separation
key_challenges: Contemporary Iranian cinema: Moral complexity, class issues
Cultural context: Iranian legal system, family dynamics
Narrative structure: Multiple perspectives on single event

movies.title: Shoplifters
key_challenges: Social realism: Family themes, economic hardship
Cultural context: Contemporary Japan, social isolation
Technical approach: Naturalistic acting, observational style

movies.title: Roma
key_challenges: Personal history: Cuarón's childhood, class dynamics
Technical approach: Black & white, single cinematographer (Cuarón himself)
Cultural context: 1970s Mexico City, domestic workers' lives

movies.title: The 400 Blows
key_challenges: French New Wave origins: Truffaut's autobiographical style
Cultural context: Post-war French youth, education system
Technical innovation: Location shooting, natural lighting

movies.title: Holy Motors
key_challenges: Post-cinema: Carax's surrealism, performance art
Technical approach: Multiple genres within single film
Cultural context: Digital age, identity fluidity

movies.title: Inland Empire
key_challenges: Lynch's digital aesthetic: Shot on DV, low-budget
Narrative structure: Non-linear, dream logic
Technical approach: Improvised, experimental filmmaking

movies.title: Eraserhead
key_challenges: Midnight movie: Industrial soundscape, body horror
Technical approach: Black & white, surreal imagery
Cultural context: 1970s industrial America, alienation

movies.title: Stories We Tell
key_challenges: Meta-documentary: Truth vs. memory, family secrets
Technical approach: Mix of archival footage and re-enactments
Cultural context: Canadian family dynamics, 1980s

movies.title: Tangerine
key_challenges: Technical innovation: Shot on iPhone, hyperrealism
Cultural context: LA trans community, Christmas Eve
Narrative approach: Real-time storytelling, authentic casting
